title.rendered: HOW TO COMPLETE THE YOAST SEO PLUGIN

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]How to complete the Yoast SEO Plugin

Everyone who has a website or is blogging has likely heard about SEO.

If you are one of those that doesn’t yet know what SEO is, it is the process of impacting the visibility of your website in a search engine, like Google or Bing.

We all know it is important for your site to have good Search Engine Optimisation.

WordPress is one of the most commonly used website platforms because it is well-coded and flexible. Because of this it is also very SEO friendly. But the real SEO benefit comes from the Yoast SEO plugin.

This plugin is by far the most complete SEO solution that is available for WordPress. It has received over a million downloads. The reason you use it is to improve our on-page SEO. This means it can create great looking search summary snippets.
The snippet is the blue, green and black text that appears in any search you do in a search engine. To illustrate this try and google your now business name. Here is what shows when I Google my clients business Muka Portraits.

As this can be a bit complex to explain in words, I have created a video showing you how to do your own for each of your pages on your website.

I hope it’s helpful, please let me know if you would like 1:1 training on completing these specific for you or if you would like your site to be updated with improved on-page SEO.

Johannah x[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/rTDyhxB8ou4″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
